_source.short_desc: SOCi is the marketing platform multi-location brands.
_source.long_desc: SOCi is the marketing platform for multi-location brands. We empower businesses like Ace Hardware, Sport Clips, & Anytime Fitness to scale marketing efforts across all digital channels in a way that's brand directed, locally perfected, & data connected. As one central place to scale marketing, SOCi makes the impossible possible by enabling top brands & their locations to strengthen and scale their digital presence across limitless local search and social pages while protecting their reputation.
_source.target_audience: We empower multi-location marketers to reach and engage their local customers, across 100s or 1000s of local search, social, and review pages.

category_features.name: Artwork Management
category_features.definition: Streamline design processes and ensure brand accuracy so assets can be pushed live more quickly.

category_features.name: Campaign Management
category_features.definition: Create a collection of marketing actions to complete specific goals

category_features.name: Change Management
category_features.definition: Track and monitor efficient handling of all changes/transitions

category_features.name: Fulfillment Distribution
category_features.definition: Access a central warehouse of data and files for efficient and controlled distribution of assets.

category_features.name: Project Management
category_features.definition: Plan and coordinate all the resources, costs and time needed to execute assignments

category_features.name: Workflow Management
category_features.definition: Create, design, and automate processes within the software

category_features.name: Campaign Analytics
category_features.definition: Track and interpret campaign performance metrics

category_features.name: Competitor Monitoring
category_features.definition: Track activity of your competitors

category_features.name: Customizable Reports
category_features.definition: Alter the layout and content of reports

category_features.name: Engagement Tracking
category_features.definition: Metrics that provide insight into how often followers interact with posts

category_features.name: Influencer Tracking
category_features.definition: Identify and track activity, including generated revenue, of prominent social media personalities that have sway over public opinion

category_features.name: Lead Attribution
category_features.definition: Identify the source channel that resulted in a new lead in the system

category_features.name: Multi-Channel Data Collection
category_features.definition: Collect information from multiple sources

category_features.name: Post Scheduling
category_features.definition: Assign a specific time to when pre-written content appears on social media sites

related_products.short_desc: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster.
related_products.features: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster. As the backbone for your customer relationships, they provide AI-powered, user-friendly tools anyone can use to be successful. Mailchimp puts your audience at the center so you can send marketing emails and automated messages, create targeted ad campaigns, build landing pages, send postcards, facilitate reporting and analytics, and sell online.

related_products.short_desc: Design and publish anything in a few clicks. From brochure to video, access thousands of templates, images, videos, and more for free.
related_products.features: Design isn't just for designers. It's for anyone with ideas to share. Canva is the online platform that makes designing anything easy, for every individual and team. With thousands of professionally made templates to get you started, you can create, customize, and share your designs in a few clicks. From stickers to professional brochures, stunning videos to workplace presentations, it's never been easier to achieve your design goals.

related_products.short_desc: Hootsuite helps you build your brand, strengthen connections with customers, and drive real business results with social media.
related_products.features: Social media is a wild place to do business. That's why thousands of brands rely on Hootsuite's tools and expertise to bring order to the chaos. Launch brilliant social campaigns, deliver 5-star social commerce experiences, and manage all your customer conversations in one place. Plus, get access to industry leading certifications, training, and coaching to help you push your results on social media further, faster.

related_products.short_desc: Confluence is a team workspace where knowledge and collaboration meet. Create, collaborate, and organize your work all in one place.
related_products.features: Confluence is a team workspace where knowledge and collaboration meet. It's a central source of truth for fast-moving companies. Confluence keeps everyone organized and aligned  with everything from meeting notes to strategy docs and IT documentation so they can make better decisions faster and be more responsive to change. Confluence integrates seamlessly with the Atlassian suite of products like Jira Software and Trello, and allows for endless customization with apps from our Marketplace.

related_products.short_desc: Brand the entire customer shipping experience and increase repeat business with ShippingEasy's Brand Management Software.
related_products.features: Minimize distractions, increase repeat business, and grow your audience with Brand Management software from ShippingEasy. Curate a branded experience with a brand-cohesive page, improve customer support with one-click tracking, feature your social channels, and drive traffic to your website with personalized links that keep customers coming back for more. Build a branded experience from inbox to landing page with branded emails. Try it free for 30 days!

related_products.short_desc: PicMonkey offers cloud-based photo editing and design tools that help your create stunning images that tell your brand story.
related_products.features: PicMonkey's design and photo editing tools help you create captivating images to promote your brand. Get stunning results with luxe templates for logos, social posts, ads, banners, and more, or start from scratch and add design building blocks. When your business grows, PicMonkey grows with you; PicMonkey Business offers tools like brand kits, collaboration tools, and asset management to increase your output and keep your brand look consistent. Accessible as a cloud-based site and a mobile app.

related_products.short_desc: Sprout Social offers social media engagement, publishing, analytics, listening and reporting solutions for leading agencies and brands.
related_products.features: Sprout Social offers social media engagement, publishing, analytics, listening and reporting solutions for leading agencies and brands including Loews Hotel, NBC Universal, Macys, Chipotle and Sony. Available via web browser, iOS and Android, Sprout enables brands to simplify social management, collaborate across teams and provide an exceptional customer experience. Sprout Social supports Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, and Pinterest.

related_products.short_desc: An easy-to-use listings management product to efficiently update, manage, and track information anywhere customers may be looking.
related_products.features:
Birdeye Listings consists of listings scan, listings management, and listings analytics. The scan identifies
errors across all online directories. Listing management allows you to easily correct information and make
updates. Listings Analytics helps to know how well your listings are doing in terms of engaged leads, traffic,
and search volume.

related_products.short_desc: Brandfolder is the industry-leading, most intuitive Brand Management platform
related_products.features: An industry leader in Brand Management software, Brandfolder delivers a platform that is as intuitive for users as it is powerful for admins, to easily store, manage, share, manipulate, and analyze assets across hundreds of formats including 8K video, documents, images, and 3D renderings. With best-in-class services, support, security, and scalability, Brandfolder helps global brands create compelling, timely, and consistent brand experiences with unparalleled efficiency and speed.

related_products.short_desc: All-in-one SEO suite of tools. Helps businesses to improve rankings, increase traffic, and gain visibility in search results.
related_products.features: Moz Pro is an all-in-one SEO suite of tools. It allows businesses to improve rankings, increase traffic, and gain more visibility in search results. Main features include keyword research, rank tracking, backlink analysis, and site audit. Keyword research tools allow businesses to improve their content and strategies. Businesses can uncover competitive advantages by tracking competitors through SERPs, fix technical problems with the help of Moz Pro suggestions and perform weekly site audits.

related_products.short_desc: Power your content with an award-winning brand management solutions and service beyond compare.
related_products.features: Widen, an Acquia Company, and maker of the award-winning digital asset management (DAM) platform, the Widen Collective, is recognized by Capterra users for Best Value and Best Ease of Use. Widen provides a central source for product content and brand assets. Primarily serving mid-to-large companies of 500+ employees, Widen's cloud-based solutions for enterprise DAM and PIM, marketing workflow, and brand management deliver high-quality software and unparalleled service.

similar_products.short_desc: Confluence is a team workspace where knowledge and collaboration meet. Create, collaborate, and organize your work all in one place.
similar_products.features: Confluence is a team workspace where knowledge and collaboration meet. It's a central source of truth for fast-moving companies. Confluence keeps everyone organized and aligned  with everything from meeting notes to strategy docs and IT documentation so they can make better decisions faster and be more responsive to change. Confluence integrates seamlessly with the Atlassian suite of products like Jira Software and Trello, and allows for endless customization with apps from our Marketplace.

similar_products.features: An industry leader in Brand Management software, Brandfolder delivers a platform that is as intuitive for users as it is powerful for admins, to easily store, manage, share, manipulate, and analyze assets across hundreds of formats including 8K video, documents, images, and 3D renderings. With best-in-class services, support, security, and scalability, Brandfolder helps global brands create compelling, timely, and consistent brand experiences with unparalleled efficiency and speed.

similar_products.short_desc: MediaValet helps Marketing and Creative teams easily manage, collaborate on and distribute their marketing assets, visuals and content.
similar_products.features:
MediaValet is a cloud-based DAM that helps Marketing and Creative teams across all industries easily manage, collaborate on and distribute their digital content.

With unlimited users, support and training, MediaValet is fast and easy to use. It's trusted by leading brands like Experian, Margaritaville, Brand USA and TDIndustries.

similar_products.short_desc: Bynder's digital asset management platform helps you conquer the chaos of proliferating content. Unite. Create. Thrive.
similar_products.features:
Bynder goes far beyond managing digital assets. Our digital asset management platform enables teams to conquer the chaos of proliferating content, touchpoints, and relationships in order to thrive.

With powerful and intuitive solutions that embrace the way people want to work, and a richly integrated ecosystem, we are the brand ally that unifies and transforms the creation and sharing of assets, inspiring teams, delighting customers, and elevating businesses.

similar_products.short_desc: Bring together everyone who works on your brand - plus all the guidelines, templates, and materials - in a single brand platform.
similar_products.features: Frontify brings together everyone who's working on your brand - plus all the guidelines, templates, and materials they need - in a single brand management platform. With Frontify, you can centralize every brand asset, easily create brand guidelines to organize and showcase your brand, and streamline collaboration across teams. Used by more than 5,000 brands and 650k users, Frontify is where brands live.

similar_products.short_desc: Enable any team to focus on creating the most influential brandEnable any team to focus on creating the most influential brand
similar_products.features: Enable any team to focus on creating the most influential brand. Marketing managers can now build the perfect high-level overviews for their team. Discuss strategy, log creative requests, and assign tasks to different team members so everyone knows exactly what to prioritize. Analyze progress and campaign performance for any brand initiative. From ideation to execution, monday marketer makes it easy to manage every aspect of their brand.

similar_products.short_desc: BEAM is a custom brand asset management tool for large companies to provide global access to self-service brand guidelines & training.
similar_products.features: BEAM is a brand asset management solution best suited for large and enterprise businesses (such as Deloitte, Allstate, & Salesforce) to provide employees and vendors with self-service brand guidelines, training, assets, reporting and more. It is built unique to each brand by global brand experts, with a tailored design for best user experience and engagement resources such as dynamic template creation, help desk, and robust content/asset sharing tools.

similar_products.short_desc: A design & brand templating platform empowering non-designers to create beautiful marketing materials without going off brand.
similar_products.features: Empower your non-designer colleagues to create marketing materials all on their own (without running the risk of going off brand). Lockable templates ensure your branded colors, fonts, and logos stay locked down while still allowing for small design tweaks and customization - easing the workload off your creative team. Say goodbye to rogue branding (and overloaded design teams) forever with Marq - the brand templating platform trusted by over 7 million users worldwide.

similar_products.short_desc: Power your content with an award-winning brand management solutions and service beyond compare.
similar_products.features: Widen, an Acquia Company, and maker of the award-winning digital asset management (DAM) platform, the Widen Collective, is recognized by Capterra users for Best Value and Best Ease of Use. Widen provides a central source for product content and brand assets. Primarily serving mid-to-large companies of 500+ employees, Widen's cloud-based solutions for enterprise DAM and PIM, marketing workflow, and brand management deliver high-quality software and unparalleled service.

similar_products.short_desc: Marvia is the brand management platform that helps keep you on-brand and enables your team to create more, without hiring more.
similar_products.features: Protect, control and own your brand and assets everywhere with Marvia's Brand Management platform. Loved by the world's leading brands and more than 100K users, Marvia helps you organize, localize and distribute your content to all of your channels. Use Branded Templates, Digital Asset Management and Brand Guidelines to create more on-brand content, faster.

similar_products.short_desc: Simple, fast, and intuitive. Dash is the affordable Brand Asset Management tool for growing and small businesses. From $74/#49 monthly.
similar_products.features:
Dash is a simple and affordable brand asset management tool. Keep your brand content consistent, up-to-date, and accessible. Use Dash to save hours each day and give your team access to all the on-brand images and videos when they need them. 

Create one place for all your brand content. Organise and find files fast with AI auto-tags and unlimited custom fields. Collaborate, share, approve content and control user access simply with a few clicks. 

From $74/#49 monthly. 14-day free trial.

similar_products.short_desc: Brand Asset Management & Media Library software in one integrated, secure and cost-effective solution. Unlimited users in all plans!
similar_products.features:
Filecamp is a cloud-based Brand Asset Management (BAM) software solution that helps companies organize and share their brand assets such as images, logos, colors and brand guidelines.

Unlimited users in all plans, each user configured with their own set of user-, and folder permissions.

Unique custom branding options will make sure everything is in sync with your brand guide.

More than 1500 brands from all over the world trust Filecamp with their digital assets and brand guidelines.

similar_products.short_desc: Imagen helps you progress creative projects, collaborate and control the availability of your brand assets across your organisation.
similar_products.features: Maintaining control of your growing library of brand and marketing assets can be time-consuming and distracting, particularly when you should be concentrating on creative tasks. Imagen is a smart, simple to use brand management portal, offering one source of truth for all types and size of businesses. Store, access and securely distribute video, images, audio and documents across your organisation or to external partners through a customisable platform that?s available from any connected device.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Campaign Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Campaign Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Campaign Management software enables organizations to automate the tracking, delivery, reporting and analysis of marketing campaigns and promotions through the integration of customer data sources and the ability to parse the data through a broad range of analytic searches. Using this type of marketing campaign reporting allows organizations to evaluate and optimize multiple campaigns for different business sectors based on real-world analysis of their effectiveness. Campaign Management software is related to Email Marketing software, Marketing Automation software and Search Marketing Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Digital Asset Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Digital Asset Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Digital Asset Management software automates the management of images and other non-textual materials. Digital Asset Management applications enable powerful, flexible solutions for developing, organizing, and distributing digital assets across multiple office locations and business sectors. These solutions ensure optimal usage for an organization's rich media assets such as advertising pieces, product images, sales collateral, audio, and video files. Digital Asset Management software is related to Document Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Marketing Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Marketing Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Marketing Automation software enables organizations to automate their marketing functions including campaign creation, market segmentation and response analysis. These applications also allow greater integration between sales staff and management as well as expanded abilities to evaluate the effectiveness of marketing campaigns. Marketing Automation solutions enable the enterprise-wide sharing of information, providing an essential conduit between management, sales and marketing operations. Marketing Automation software is related to Campaign Management software, Email Marketing software and Search Marketing software.

_source.short_desc: A centralized platform for multi-location marketers to reach and engage their local customers, across 100s or 1000s of local pages.
_source.long_desc: SOCi is an award-winning localized marketing platform built specifically for multi-location marketers. Our customers include top brands and influencers like Ace Hardware, Sport Clips, and Anytime Fitness who have the impossible challenge of managing their digital presence across hundreds and thousands of locations. As central command for multi-location marketers, SOCi makes the impossible possible by enabling top brands and their locations to strengthen and scale their digital presence.
_source.target_audience: We empower multi-location marketers to reach and engage their local customers, across 100s or 1000s of local search, social, and review pages.

related_products.short_desc: Keep your launches smooth and your communication clear by using Trello to see which tasks are on track, and which content is up next.
related_products.features: From planning a launch, to editorial calendar content, to meeting agendas and everything in between, Trello helps your marketing teams get more done. Trello is the command center that connects all your tasks and tools to show status updates, due dates, and allows you to quickly comment back and forth to teammates. Attach files and tickets from other apps like Google Docs and Salesforce, so everything stays together. Keep launches smooth and your whole marketing team on the same page.

related_products.short_desc: Hootsuite helps you build your brand, strengthen connections with customers, and drive real business results with social media.
related_products.features: Social media is a wild place to do business. That's why thousands of brands rely on Hootsuite's tools and expertise to bring order to the chaos. Launch brilliant social campaigns, deliver 5-star social commerce experiences, and manage all your customer conversations in one place. Plus, get access to industry leading certifications, training, and coaching to help you push your results on social media further, faster.

related_products.short_desc: Social media solution that helps businesses manage content, create and edit posts, and monitor engagement across Instagram accounts.
related_products.features: Social media solution that helps businesses manage content, create and edit posts, and monitor engagement across Instagram accounts.

related_products.short_desc: Social Media Marketing App Powered By Marketing 360? #1 Marketing Platform? For Small Business.
related_products.features: Get everything you need to manage and grow your business all from a singular platform  create your account today to explore the platform and compare plans and pricing.

related_products.short_desc: Complete social media management tool for agencies and teams of all sizes. Read why Capterra reviewers love Agorapulse.
related_products.features: Agorapulse is a social media management tool that enables agencies, businesses and marketers to manage all their social media messages, schedule and publish content, identify key influencers, monitor social channels, and get stunning reports all in one easy-to-use dashboard. Agorapulse currently supports Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, YouTube, and LinkedIn. Additional free tools include Easy Advocacy (employee advocacy / sharing) and AdsReport (Facebook Ads reporting).

related_products.short_desc: ContentStudio is a data-driven content marketing and social media tool that allows you to discover, compose and share engaging content.
related_products.features:
ContentStudio is a multi-use social media management and content marketing tool that allows you to discover, compose and share the best content. It has a suite of products for content discovery, publishing, planning, analytics and automation to help marketing teams work and collaborate efficiently.

It is the perfect tool for discovering trending content, managing multiple social media networks, recycling evergreen posts, analyzing performance, collaborating with the team and a lot more.

related_products.short_desc: Create real connection with best-in-class social media management software | Try Sprout Free
related_products.features: Sprout Social offers powerful social management solutions for leading agencies and brands including Hyatt, Ogilvy, Leo Burnett, Evernote and Microsoft. Sprout enables brands to simplify social management, reporting, publishing, customer service, engagement and much more | Try Sprout Free For 30 Days.

related_products.short_desc: Loomly is the Brand Success Platform that empowers marketing teams to collaborate, publish and measure.
related_products.features: Loomly is the Brand Success Platform that empowers marketing teams to collaborate, publish and measure. Streamline teamwork along your entire content management process: manage digital assets, fuel storytelling, polish content, approve messaging, reach your audience, engage your community and measure performance. Now supporting organic content, boosted posts and objective-driven campaigns. All in one collaborative solution.

related_products.short_desc: Social media management software built for small business
related_products.features: Meet Thryv, the social media management software built for small business. Thryv integrates with your favorite social media accounts including Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn and Google+, so you can post content out all at once or schedule posts in advance. Pull from a library of more than 500,000 posts you can tailor to fit your business. Then learn more about your contacts with social data enrichment that connect to their accounts.

related_products.short_desc: Social media content discovery & sharing platform. Connect to Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram & Facebook accounts & cut down time by 90%.
related_products.features: Content curation, social media management and employee advocacy platform. Connects with Twitter, LinkedIn & Facebook accounts and cuts down social media management effort by up to 90%. Key features- multiple account management, collaborative social media management, content suggestions, RSS feed addition, content library, advanced post scheduling, group account scheduling, hashtag and @mention suggestions, engagement and click-through metrics, URL shortener, employee advocacy with analytics

related_products.short_desc: Smart, automated social media and messenger marketing platform that allows you to create, schedule and promote content.
related_products.features:
Contenive employs the whole social media management cycle, revealing not just effective content production, but also competitive field analysis, contextual network planning, placement, and analysis of outcomes.
Contenive is a proprietary solution that combines artificial and live intelligence to guarantee the high-quality generation (of visual and textual material) as well as instant posting with little client input.

similar_products.short_desc: Cloud Campaign is the easiest way for social media agencies to manage multiple brands at scale. Low-cost and packed with features.
similar_products.features:
Cloud Campaign is the easiest way for marketing agencies to manage multiple social media accounts at scale, packed with enterprise features such as brand workspaces, taggable content library, client-access portals, clean client reports and white-label services.

No other social media management platform compares to our affordability and usability, backed by our top-rated US-based customer support team.

Start your FREE 14-day trial to see firsthand how you could spend up to 80% less time on SMM.

similar_products.short_desc: Build customer relationships for life with data-first digital marketing
similar_products.features: Meet Salesforce Social Studio. Listen, engage, and publish using a powerful all-in-one social media marketing and management suite and connect enriched social data to your marketing with sales and service. Analyze conversations from nearly any source to see what your industry and fans are saying. Respond to social posts, manage your community, and provide customer support. Create and approve content for multiple social networks and accounts from desktop or mobile.

similar_products.short_desc: The end-to-end Social Marketing Cloud for the modern marketer and enterprises. Everything you need in a social media management tool.
similar_products.features:
Emplifi Social Marketing Cloud is an end-to-end Social Marketing Platform for modern enterprises that provides a single, centralized solution for all your efforts to understand and drive customers' engagement on social media. Emplifi's AI-powered tools, automation, and real-
time insights improve the entire process of content creation and social media management. 

Get the superpowers every marketer needs to convert your followers to customers - all in one platform!

similar_products.features: From planning a launch, to editorial calendar content, to meeting agendas and everything in between, Trello helps your marketing teams get more done. Trello is the command center that connects all your tasks and tools to show status updates, due dates, and allows you to quickly comment back and forth to teammates. Attach files and tickets from other apps like Google Docs and Salesforce, so everything stays together. Keep launches smooth and your whole marketing team on the same page.

similar_products.short_desc: All-in-one Social Media Management solution for publishing, reporting, influencer marketing, benchmarking, and engagement.
similar_products.features: Brandwatch (formerly Falcon.io) provides a comprehensive, all-in-one Social Media Management solution. It's a one-stop solution for any marketer's social listening, publishing, engagement, measurement, and benchmarking needs. Brandwatch helps marketers deliver more personalized brand experiences across all digital touchpoints, based on enriched customer profiles. This solution features a highly intuitive and collaborative UI and is complemented by the best support team in the business.

similar_products.short_desc: Loomly is the Brand Success Platform that empowers marketing teams to collaborate, publish and measure.
similar_products.features: Loomly is the Brand Success Platform that empowers marketing teams to collaborate, publish and measure. Streamline teamwork along your entire content management process: manage digital assets, fuel storytelling, polish content, approve messaging, reach your audience, engage your community and measure performance. Now supporting organic content, boosted posts and objective-driven campaigns. All in one collaborative solution.

similar_products.short_desc: SmarterQueue is an intelligent social media scheduling tool.
similar_products.features:
SmarterQueue is an intelligent social media scheduling tool that empowers marketers, content creators, and entrepreneurs with the technology and capabilities they need to grow their businesses and careers. 

SmarterQueue's intelligent social media scheduler enables scheduling automation powered by queues and queue posting plans, content categories, evergreen recycling, visual calendars, and content variations.

It also includes advanced analytics, a social inbox, and content curation.

similar_products.short_desc: Instagram-first social media scheduler with link in bio tool, automatic story scheduling, grid planner, collaboration tools.
similar_products.features:
Sked Social is an Instagram-first social media scheduler. With a link-in-bio tool, automatic story scheduling, grid planner, and people, place, and product tagging, Sked has your Instagram scheduling sorted.

You can also cross-post your Instagram content to Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Pinterest, YouTube, Google My Business, TikTok and Snapchat - all from the same place.

And if you need external and internal reviews, you can upgrade to get collaboration features.

similar_products.short_desc: Social media SaaS platform for franchises combining cloud-based social media technology, artificial intelligence and employee advocacy.
similar_products.features: Rallio is a powerful SaaS platform combining cloud-based social media technology, artificial intelligence and employee advocacy. As the supplier of choice for franchise organizations and small businesses, Rallio enables multi-location brands and SMB operators to optimize their social media engagement, while managing their entire social media presence, online reputation, and online directory listings in one dashboard for all locations.

similar_products.short_desc: Complete social media management tool for agencies and teams of all sizes. Read why Capterra reviewers love Agorapulse.
similar_products.features: Agorapulse is a social media management tool that enables agencies, businesses and marketers to manage all their social media messages, schedule and publish content, identify key influencers, monitor social channels, and get stunning reports all in one easy-to-use dashboard. Agorapulse currently supports Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, YouTube, and LinkedIn. Additional free tools include Easy Advocacy (employee advocacy / sharing) and AdsReport (Facebook Ads reporting).

similar_products.short_desc: AI tool to discover and analyze influencers, marketing campaigns on Instagram, YouTube, TikTok, and uncover competitors strategy.
similar_products.features: HypeAuditor is a SaaS company that has developed a comprehensive set of tools to discover influencers on Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, Twitter, and Twitch, verify the authenticity of their accounts, and track the results of their influencer marketing campaigns. All services are based on AI algorithms, allowing HypeAuditor to identify behavioral patterns. HypeAuditor aims to provide the ultimate social media analytics and management platform to ensure our clients work effectively with creators.

similar_products.short_desc: Social media management driven by data science. Find the best combo of emojis, hashtags, words, images and more! Works with Hootsuite!
similar_products.features: Social media management driven by data science for smallest of small business owners around the world to compete against unlimited marketing budgets. Use the power of AI to create, curate and schedule content on major social media platforms (Facebook, Twitter, Linked, Instagram, Shopify, Wordpress, Medium and more) as well as new ones (ie TikTok). Type social media posts (or blog posts) using built in autocomplete + auto emoji suggest for engaging emojis. Also works with Hootsuite(18M+ users!).

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Public Relations software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Public Relations tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Public Relations software allows PR professionals to collaborate effectively with contacts, as well as plan, manage, distribute, and track campaigns. This type of software may also provide media monitoring functionality, competitive media analysis, broadcast solutions, and news media information retrieval solutions to help PR professionals make knowledgeable decisions. Public Relations software may also include job estimating, accounting and client communication features to help PR professionals maintain strong external relationships. Public Relations software is related to Marketing Automation software and Campaign Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Reputation Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Reputation Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Reputation Management software helps organizations keep on top of what is being said about the organization and their products in various blogs, social networks, and media. Analytical capabilities of Reputation Management software allow marketing departments to measure and evaluate consumers' reactions to marketing campaigns and help companies better plan their future outreach. Reputation Management software is related to Brand Management software and Social Networking software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Social Media Marketing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Social Media Marketing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Social Media Marketing software automates the creation, tracking, and management of online campaigns through social sites such as Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, YouTube, etc. This software helps with publishing coupons and promotions and collecting customer response metrics.Social Media Marketing platforms offer integrated email that could be linked to multiple accounts in any of the social networks thus creating a single, go-to place for several simultaneous campaigns. Social Media Marketing software is closely related to Social Monitoring software and many solutions offer both capabilities in one package. For related software see also Campaign Management software.
